title: Stephen King & Stewart O'Nan - A Face in the Crowd (2012)Epu
description:
A Face in the Crowd - Stephen King & Stewart O'Nan

The writing team that delivered the bestselling Faithful, about the 2004 Red Sox championship season, takes readers to the ballpark again, and to a world beyond, in an eBook original to be published on August 21, 2012.

Dean Evers, an elderly widower, sits in front of the television with nothing better to do than waste his leftover evenings watching baseball.
